name: 3rd Invasion - Zombies vs. Steel
description:
The Storm is About to break.
The enemies are ready, are You.?
The first army is the Zombies and the Undead.

This a Real Time Strategy.
You start as the General of the Steel Army.
You have to battle three different types of Armies.
The first is The Zombies, and the Undead

A collection of the best Units from the armies around is under your command.
The Story so fare
The storm is about to break.
But we don't know what it is or where it is from...

The 1st Invasion was the Zombie Plage. The Zombie Killing Cyborgs from 1st Core, tried to hold them back.
The 2nd Invasion was the Undead Awaken. The Wizards from the 2nd Circle, nearly fought them to a stand still.
But both invasion was not from Earth...

Now our Armies are starting to work together. They are fighting back the First and the Second Invasion, but we know something else is comming.

Each time just before an Invasion started we had problems with radars all over the world.
Sometimes they go offline for an hour, sometimes they burned out.
And every time a Zombie plage hits or the Undead Awakes 10 days after.

This time we might be ready, because the radar just went offline.
And we started an airlift, into the area...

Now You just have to wait.
